long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The fastest AI text expander for your browser.

Cheetah empowers you to supercharge your workflow, crafting shortcuts that automate emails, outreach, and documents, all while maintaining impeccable grammar and style.

Discover the incredible benefits of this extension:

✔️ Effortlessly transform lengthy messages (emails, connection requests, support replies, and more) into concise one-word triggers.

✔️ Instantly convert your writing into polished shortcut templates with just a few clicks.

✔️Receive immediate AI-driven grammar suggestions and rewrites, elevating your text expansions to captivating, unique, and seamlessly integrated pieces.

Gain an undeniable edge over your peers and competitors. Elevate your online writing, email communications, and sales pitches with the unrivaled power of Cheetah.

With the Cheetah Typer extension, revolutionize your online writing experience. While others waste time copying and pasting pitches, scheduling messages, and introductions, you'll effortlessly outpace them, thanks to the AI prowess of Cheetah Typer.

Our text expander seamlessly integrates with popular platforms like Gmail, Google Docs, LinkedIn, Zendesk, and more, ensuring you accomplish more in less time.

Don't wait any longer—download the extension now and unlock a new era of efficiency and effectiveness.
